author: ChrisMisan
body:
**Overview:**
This PR introduces new diamond DQM module with following changes to the previous one:

- Online/Offline switch, as implemented in pixel DQM: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/DQM/CTPPS/plugins/CTPPSPixelDQMSource.cc
- Number of OOT windows depends on passed python parameter
- Some plots were removed
- Added cross rp track correlation plots
- Added time distribution plots
- Removed most hardcoded values, they are now extracted directly from the data

**Lumisection plots:**
Following the discussion on lumisection plots it was decided to leave them commented out for the time being due to possible unforeseen issues when parallelized.

**Memory performance:**
This is memory consumption for cmsRun process running whole DQM Online.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52073715/135131783-7e03e5d3-8201-44a9-94a1-534d726d806f.png)
title: Diamond dqm
